name: Ability: Second Wind
lore: A warrior's stamina reserves are invaluable in the heat of battle  Captain Bynde
onCastText: You draw upon your reserve stamina for that final push.
onCastTargetFail: You have plenty of stamina, your attempts are pointless.

name: Ability: Battlecry: Charge!
lore: Forward my brothers! We shall win the day! General Mato
onCastText: You spur yourself and your allies into a charge.

name: Ability: Blind Strength
lore: A true warrior can enter an astonishing rage to make himself more effective General Mato
onCastText: You feel a rush of pride and adrenaline shoot through your body.

name: Ancient: Iron Bullet
lore: And with that bow, call from the sky for arrows
onCastText: Arrows appear suddenly within your bow.
onCastEndText: The miracle arrows deplete.

name: Spell: Generous Waters
lore: Observe my brothers, the gift of the gods!- Ioni Miriad
onCastText: A lifeless piece of food floats ashore.

name: Spell: Feet of the Wind
lore: Make no haste when traveling this land, move quickly to your destination. Sepa
onCastText: Your feet seem light and eager.
onCastEndText: You begin to cough on your spit and slow

name: Spell: Triumphant Lungs
lore: Who needs air when Methabeht will provide? Ioni Miriad
onCastText: You inhale a tremendous breath of air
onCastEndText: Your lungs become hungry for air once more

name: Ability: Warm Blankets of Matron
lore: And to my children, I leave this cloth. As shelter and safety.
onCastText: A warmth of good spirits is spread to those around you.

name: Ability: Dodge
lore: Good look hitting me! Bleed of the Cell Squad
description: player quickly shoots 10 blocks in the direction they are facing
onCastText: You travel twenty steps further
onCastEndText: You quickly dash out the way of your foes.

name: Ancient: Memories of The Under
lore: The battle was fierce and lasted weeks, the Orcs never tiring and the proto-humans suffering endless losses." Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: Memories of the past flourish rage from within.
onCastEndText: Your muscles begin to burn and cramp.

name: Ancient: Coat of Fur
lore: They shot through the dark pines hungry for their next meal, in a pack as one. Scholar Aquilar
description: Turns player to wolfmob, gives speed
onCastText: A fine coat of fur covers your skin as you transform.
onCastEndText: Fur falls to the ground revealing your true form.

name: Ancient: Arcane Shield
lore: The Arcane Shield is passed down since the time of the Vishim
onCastText: You evoke the power of Golkara to protect you from ranged attacks
onCastEndText: The shield powers down

name: Ancient: Hardskin
lore: The Lizardmen have always had the ability to take a few more hits when the going gets tough General Mato
onCastText: You brace yourself for an incoming attack, your scales lock together.
onCastEndText: You cannot sustain the Hardskin any more

name: Ancient: Curse of Deuzulus
lore: The ancient curse of Deuzulus, passed down for generations.
onCastText: You mutter an Ancient Curse at your foe.
onCastEndText: The effects of the curse wear off
onCastTargetText: You are curse by the Ancient god Deuzulus
onCastTargetFail: You have no target

name: Ancient: Flameshield
lore: The beings of the element can survive in places others could never Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: Ingorir guards you from harm.
onCastEndText: The shield can  sustain no longer

name: Ancient: Blink
lore: The power of 'Blinking' is taught to High Human children at an early age. Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: You use the power of your mind to hurl your body forward.

name: Ancient: Natural Agility
lore: The Halfling race has always been a hard one to keep track of in the heat of battle Captain Bynde
onCastText: You dart around, at speeds inaccessible to larger races
onCastEndText: You are now back to normal speed

name: Ancient: Stomp
lore: The Ogre's can use their sheer mass to great effect in combat Captain Bynde
onCastText: You slam your foot onto the ground, knocking your foes backwoulds
onCastTargetText: You are thrown back by an almighty stomp
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Ancient: Furious assult
lore: The Trolls have an innate ability to summon bursts of furious strength Captain Bynde
onCastText: You take a deep breath before beginning a furious assault
onCastEndText: You can sustain your assult no more

name: Ancient: Wrist Cannon
lore: The Gnomes' intuitive application of technology is very impressive General Mato
onCastText: You launch a missile from your wrist mounted cannon
onCastTargetText: You are struck by s flaming cannonball
onCastTargetFail: Your cannon cannot lock onto any target

name: Ancient: Dark Infection
lore: The various diseases carried by the undead's rotten flesh are often turned on their enemies. Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: You will your very essence to Infect your foe
onCastTargetText: You are stricken by a dark infection
onCastTargetFail: There is no target

name: Ancient: Barbaric charge
lore: The charge of a Barbarian is a sight to behold Captain Bynde
onCastText: You use your entire being to charge forward.
onCastEndText: You can sustain that speed no longer

name: Ability: Battlecry: Brace yourselves
lore: They are coming for us brothers! We shall make them rue the day! General Mato

name: Ancient: Mechanical Weapon
lore: The ancient mechanical weapon of the clockworks is legend Scholar Aquilar

name: Ability: Gouge
lore: A bleeding foe will fall with ease Captain Bynde
onCastText: You gouge into your target with your weapon, causing them to bleed.
onCastTargetText: You are bleeding!

name: Ability: Block
lore: To block an attack is the first step, it only becomes useful if you can retaliate Captain Bynde
onCastText: You raise your defences.
onCastEndText: You drop your defenses again

name: Spell: Python's Gift
lore: This spell seems to have storm runes on it...
onCastText: A dark presence loom in your mind, and in your health.
onCastEndText: You feel the presence leave you

name: Spell: Decrepit Noodles
onCastText: An ill taste splashes across your tongue.
onCastEndText: You throw up the noodles

name: Ancient: Call of the legion
lore: There are many races of darkness who can move in a swarm, an incredible sight General Mato
onCastText: Your movements become part of the swarm
onCastEndText: The swarm looses momentum
onCastTargetText: You feel like part of something bigger, a swarm.

name: Ancient: Gift of Under
lore: There lay in front of them their beloved ruler now a twisted image of himself and with dominion over endless armies Scholar Aquilar
description: Heal spell exclusive to dark races
onCastText: A demon of generosity visits you.
onCastTargetFail: You are not ill.

name: Ancient: Realm of the Lightbringer
lore: Like minded elves find comfort in their shared belief in the god of nature Methabeht
onCastText: A warm breeze of good fate blows through your hair.
onCastEndText: The breeze faids

name: Ancient: Ancestor's wisdom
lore: The knowledge of the past can be draw upon in times of need Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: You feel the hands of your ancestors guiding your blade
onCastEndText: The Legacy leave your person

name: Ancient: Blessing from above
lore: We must use this blessing to further our cause! King Arkon
onCastText: You feel a blessing from above guarding you.
onCastEndText: The effect of the blessing wears off.

name: Ancient: Curse of the forsaken
lore: The forsaken turn their ancient curse against their foe. Making them a force to be reckoned with. General Mato
onCastText: You turn your curse on your advisary
onCastTargetText: The curse of the forsaken enters you

name: Ancient: Clockwork Spring Heels
lore: Many Clockworks had springed heels, allowing the traversal of terrain  Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: Springs burst out the bottom of your feet.

name: Ancient: Power Combined
lore: The human like races sealed an anchient pact to guard them in times of need Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: You feel the combined power of old guarding you.
onCastEndText: The shield guarding you wears off.

name: Ability: Wide swing
lore: Sometimes not aiming for one target is exactly what you need Captain Bynde
onCastText: You swing your blade around you, hitting all the foes around you.
onCastTargetText: You are hit by a swinging blade
onCastTargetFail: You flail your blade around but dont hit anyone

name: Ability: Stealth Shot
lore: To shoot a foe is easy, to hit them in such a way that you remain hidden, now that is a skill! Rauchlehre
onCastText: You fire a silent arrow at your foe, keeping your location hidden.
onCastTargetText: You are hit by an arrow but you have no idea where it came from.

name: Spell: Backlash
lore: The backlash is the staple of many Tsiyonian Magician's arsenals
onCastText: Your target lashes as the pain of your attack runs thought him
onCastTargetText: You lash back in pain

name: Ability: Dash
lore: A well timed dash can confuse and disorient your opponent, leaving them open to an attack Rauchlehre
onCastText: You dart forwards, now is your time to strike.

name: Ancient: Shadow Step
lore: Those goblins can disappear at a moment's notice, be on your guard men! Rauchlehre
onCastText: Transparency falls across your body.
onCastEndText: Your skin and bones return opaque

name: Spell: Magic Missile
lore: Although not the most powerful spell, Magic Missile is now known as a standard spell that every aspiring young mage must know. Scholar Aquilar
onCastText: You fire an arcane missile.

name: Spell: Breath of Methabeht
lore: Feel the breath of Methabeht upon you!
onCastText: Methabeht looks down favourably
onCastTargetText: You feel the Breath of Methabeht
onCastTargetFail: Your attempt to heal makes no difference

name: Spell: Throw Fire
lore: The Magicians of Tsiyon are renown for their ability to create storms of flames
description: like the other fire spell but it costs less so higher level people can use it more
onCastText: You launch a fireball from your hands.
onCastTargetText: You are struck by a fireball

name: Spell: Clear Skies
lore: Look upwards my son, see what methabeht can bring for us - Druid Kenria Selri
onCastText: You recite an ancient druidic spell to the heavens
onCastEndText: You feel the clouds begin to part

name: Spell: Protection of Ioni
lore: Through worship we can call upon aid in our times of need - Ioni Miriad
onCastText: You summon forth divine runes
onCastTargetText: You cover your target in divine runes
onCastTargetFail: The runes fall off your target

name: Spell: Protection of the Archon
lore: Behold! The gods look favourably upon you! - Ioni Miriad
onCastText: You summon forth superior divine runes
onCastTargetText: You cover your target in superior divine runes
onCastTargetFail: The runes fall off your target

name: Spell: Deadly whisper
lore: The shamans of old could bring the spirits to bear witness against the living
onCastText: Ancestors whisper to your opponent
onCastEndText: your foe recieves the words of your ancestors
onCastTargetText: You feel ill

name: Ancient: Ancestral Deadly whisper
lore: Goblin shamans were the foremost in curse-mongering spirits
onCastText: Ancestors whisper to your opponent
onCastEndText: your foe recieves the words of your ancestors
onCastTargetText: You feel ill

name: Spell: Stick Foot
lore: Once used by the Machelite Wizards for aid with thier footings on the passesÂ of thier mountain home
onCastText: The ground reaches up at your target
onCastEndText: Your feet are released
onCastTargetText: Your feet stick

name: Ancient: Hidden Ringmail
lore: I find that halflings tend to hide their armour under their clothes, leaving their opponent unsure how well armoured they are.
onCastText: You conceal a ringmail chest plate under your attire
onCastEndText: The chainmail falls away.

name: Ancient: Hybrid Running Style
lore: The Half Elves seem to have taken the most beneficial traits of the Elves and Humans to make them into skilled runners
onCastText: You break into a run
onCastEndText: You return to normal speed

name: Ancient: Vampiric Gaze
lore: I looked deep into his eyes and he looked deep into me, into my very essence
onCastText: To gaze deep into their very being
onCastTargetText: You feel a dark gaze upon you

name: Ancient: Take Flight
lore: With wings outstretched they took to the sky!
description: You can put any Dev note here
onCastText: Your wings stretch outwards and begin to flap for a short duration
onCastEndText: Your can no longer maintain flight and begin to plumet
onCastTargetText: Your wings stretch outwards and begin to flap for a short duration
onBuffStartText: Your wings stretch outwards and begin to flap for a short duration

name: Ancient: Great Ocean Trading Company
lore: Through a simple binding of this ancient translocation spell to our location we can bring hordes of traders to our establishment! - Grand Commisioner Xengar of the GOTC
onCastText: Speaking the incantations on the scroll opens a portal in front of you
onCastEndText: You are ripped away by the portal

name: Spell: Ice Comet
lore: Pah, you call that magic! - Last words of Kliri Xeria
onCastText: The sky darkens as your comet roars overhead!
onCastTargetText: You are crushed under the force of a Stellar Comet!

name: Ancient: Fairy Ring
lore: Watch your step about fairy rings. Peasant squire or noble kings. Lest you find that somethings queer. Once you were there and now your here.
onCastText: Mushrooms sprout about thier feet
onCastTargetText: Mushrooms sprout in a ring about your feet

name: Spell: Healing Waters
lore: Oh Manandu! Spare my people from this wretched disease!
onCastText: Manandu has answered your prayer!
onCastTargetText: You feel the warm waters of Manandu wash over you

name: Spell: Complete Heal
lore: Methabeht, I beseech thee!
description: Single target full heal (high power cost)
onCastText: A divine light shines over your target
onCastTargetText: You are enfused with life!

name: Ability: Bandage Wounds
lore: You'll have to get that looked at
onCastText: You bandage your wounds

name: Spell: Ancient Armour
lore: Ha! Ashtor stands with me this day!
onCastText: You summon forth impenetrable runes!
onCastEndText: The ancient armour fades
onCastTargetText: Ancient armour surrounds you!

name: Spell: Ice Comet II
lore: I think we can do better than that
onCastText: The sky darkens as your comet roars overhead!
onCastTargetText: You are crushed under the force of a Stellar Comet!

name: Ability: Arrow of Ashtor
lore: The God of the Hunt blessed this arrow herself
onCastText: You let loose the Arrow of Ashtor!
onCastTargetText: You are pierced by a deadly arrow!

name: Ability: Cleave
lore: WHAT DID YOU SAY!
onCastText: You strike your target with furious rage!
onCastTargetText: You have taken massive damage!

name: Spell: Bountiful Harvest
lore: Eat my friends! Eat, everyone!
onCastText: You burned the bread =\

name: Spell: Inferno
lore: Mastering the art of sorcery against one target is all well and good, but what about when you are surrounded?
onCastText: An inferno surrounds you!
onCastTargetText: You are struck by an Inferno!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Ability: Bezerk
lore: He had lost his mind!
onCastText: You go bezerk!
onCastTargetText: You are struck by savage attacks!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Ability: Dance of the Swashbuckler
lore: Come forth to me brethren!
onCastText: You engage multiple targets at once!
onCastTargetText: You are stricken by deadly attacks!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Spell: Yonder
lore: Off we go then!
onCastText: Time slows as you move at incredible speed!

name: Spell: Touch of Ingorir
lore: Only those that could withstand the flames could converse with the lord of fire
onCastText: Your target is surrounded by burning flames!
onCastEndText: The flames dissipate
onCastTargetText: You are burning!

name: Ability: Resolute Fortitude
lore: A guardian must be unwavering when facing an enemy
onCastText: You brace yourself for a heavy battle
onCastEndText: Your resolute fortitude fades
onCastTargetText: You stand your ground
onBuffStartText: You have become a living bulwark!

name: Spell: Asura's Bulwark
lore: -silence-
onCastText: Dark runes are summoned forward
onCastEndText: The dark runes dissapate
onCastTargetText: You are surrounded by dark runes!

name: Spell: Outright Dismissal
lore: We will never forget
onCastText: Your target is struck by raw power!
onCastTargetText: You feel enormous pain!

name: Ability: Assassinate
lore: Instant death with only one shot - of course!
onCastText: Right on target!
onCastTargetText: You feel very weak!

name: Ability: Pact of Aggression
lore: Send your dogs, do your worst! We have a cause to fight for and we will never give in to the likes of you!
onCastText: You dive on your opponents in a savage rage!
onCastTargetText: You are overwhelmed by savage attacks!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Spell: Succor: Plane of Air
lore: The tome blinds you as you stare into its pages
description: You can put any Dev note here
onCastText: Speaking the incantations on the scroll opens a portal in front of you
onCastEndText: You are ripped away by the portal

name: Spell: Circle of Air
lore: The tome blinds you as you stare into its pages
description: You can put any Dev note here
onCastText: You speak the ancient druidic prayer to Methabeht
onCastEndText: You are ripped away by the portal
onCastTargetText: You are ripped away by the portal

name: Spell: Chloroblast
lore: The Rangers of Asgarad were known for their prayers to Methabeht
description: Single target full heal (high power cost)
onCastText: A divine light shines over your target
onCastTargetText: You are enfused with life!

name: Spell: Maelstrom
lore: See how it is possible to take the power of Ice Comet and turn it into many?
onCastText: Ice Comets fall in all directions!
onCastTargetText: You are struck by an ice comet!

name: Spell: Manashield
lore: Your blades will do nothing against that mad mage
onCastText: You surrounded by a wall of pure mana!

name: Spell: Mark of the Predator
lore: Even the creatures of the wild fear them, for they stand at the very top of the food chain
onCastText: Poisoned tipped daggers strike your target!
onCastTargetText: You are struck by a barrage of poisoned daggers!

name: Ability: Might
lore: 5 years he's conquered that arena - i don't see him giving it up any time soon - Joaira Ragepaw
onCastText: You feel powerful!

name: Ability: Taunt
lore: Yeah you! Come on then! - Liak Ragebourne
onCastText: You taunt all around you!
onCastTargetText: You feel angry!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Ability: Strike of the Predator
lore: What's that over there in the trees? - The last words of James Hammerthorn
onCastText: You let loose the Arrow of Ashtor!
onCastTargetText: You are pierced by a deadly arrow!

name: Spell: Winds of Change
lore: With the arrival of the new gods, everything will change - Prophet Envarik
onCastText: You have healed all around you!
onCastTargetText: You are healed

name: Spell: Nova
lore: Conflagration, my dear boy - Arcanist Deliar
onCastText: You summon a nova storm!
onCastTargetText: You are struck by a nova storm!
onCastTargetFail: There is one close enough to feel the effect

name: Ability: Hold the Line
lore: Yes I'm ready! - Ebonclaw Direrage
onCastText: You brace yourself for a heavy fight

name: Ability: Poison Tipped Arrow
lore: Only those that could withstand the flames could converse with the lord of fire
onCastText: You strike your target with a poisoned tipped arrow!
onCastTargetText: You are poisoned!

name: Spell: Redemption
lore: Oh yer gonna get it! - Dwarven Battle Cleric Halrak Irontoe
onCastText: You feel ready to clobber!

name: Spell: Shield of the Magi
lore: Spells are all good, but what happens when you get into a real fight, mage? - Warrior Guildmaster Tempra Stormhand
onCastText: You feel defensive

name: Spell: Translocate Admin

name: Spell: Lifetap
lore: Few have spoken of the Burning Circle of Unseen hands, their dark bargains and treacherous deeds are rarely heard of twice
description: You can put any Dev note here
onCastText: You sap the life from your opponent and return it to yourself!
onCastTargetText: You feel your life drain away
onCastTargetFail: There is no target

name: Spell: Tranquility
lore: Relax your mind - Enchanter Jyani
description: You can put any Dev note here
onCastText: A soft breeze slips through your mind...

name: Spell: Superior Fortitude
lore: Stand your ground!
onCastText: Superior runes are summoned forward
onCastEndText: The dark runes dissapate

name: Spell: Ice Comet III
